name: Shiba Kit | 500+ Onboarding UI Screens 🐶
description:
We’ve analyzed tons of onboarding screens, and we realized there are few types of onboardings. Some include Illustrations, and some have phone mockups, etc.🚀

We’ve tried our best to incorporate all styles on 500 screens. Screens include common button types used in onboardings, various types of sliders, text styles, etc.🔥

In Shiba Kit, you can fully customize aesthetics, e.g., text styles, color styles, etc. Having been designed on Figma, you can access Shiba through the Figma Community.
